issue.title: [CI][Java] Automatically extract dependent library versions from pom.xml for s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17369](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17369). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current script `java_build.sh` requires a manual update for dependent library versions.
